content: I'm glad to hear that Samsonite has a good warranty and customer support. I've had issues with my current suitcase's wheels getting stuck, so it's good to know that I'll be covered in case anything goes wrong with my new one. Speaking of wheels, I was wondering if you could recommend any luggage accessories that could help make my travels even smoother. I've been thinking about getting a luggage tracker or a portable power bank to keep my devices charged on the go. Do you have any suggestions?
